column4: anyone know of a known bug that is causing laptop users to have excessive heat generation?
My laptop hardly ever uses the fan when it runs Ubuntu.  It doesn't seem to produce excess heat though.
Ubuntu seems to wait till it gets very hot before turning on the fan.

well the issue I am running into is that ever since I did an upgrade (and a fresh install after) I am running into excessive heat coming from the palm rests on my laptop. the cpu is idle and on power save mode but im still kicking a lot of heat
